message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate it. I'd like to propose a price of $130 for the product.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I've thought about it, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $142.50.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $137.50 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $141.50.
